subject: French Open (Tennis)
Tennis
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Even during the tennis reign of Novak Djokovic, Rafael Nadal, going for his seventh French Open singles title, deserves to be the favorite again on the red clay of Roland Garros.
snippet: Even during the tennis reign of Novak Djokovic, Rafael Nadal, going for his seventh French Open singles title, deserves to be the favorite again on the red clay of Roland Garros.
